评论详情: Great item

Y2K-inspired style and tactical combat trousers design make these pants a fun, retro addition to any wardrobe. The loose, baggy fit combined with the functional pockets and utility details gives them a streetwear appeal that pairs well with crop tops, oversized sweaters, or tucked-in tees. They’re a perfect choice for those who love a throwback aesthetic with modern-day practicality.
They were really bad

These pants are awesome  in every way!. Heavy  great quality material, lots of pockets  to store goodies in if you are a hiker like me or just don't want to carry a purse, and they are tall girl friendly.  I'm 5'11" and ordered  the medium. Wear a size 8 normally  and they were  plenty long enough  and fit true to size everywhere.  You won't be disappointed!
Love these pants. Super cute and comfortable.

I am obsessed with these pants and style.  I'm 5'8 and the pants fit just right. If you are shorter you might want to get it snipped but overall the pants complimented my curves. I loved it and btw the pants are very comfortable as well.

i'm curious how the size 8 would fit. these that i got are my regular size 10. i ignored the site's sizing recommendation saying an 8 would fit me best. at first while zipping them up they felt potentially snug. then within 30 minutes the waist started loosening up. maybe the computer suggestion was right! i love all the pockets but i'm not going to pay double what i paid over the holidays ($22) for a smaller size that may or may not fit...  so  hoping to get notified when price lowers again. Does Amazon even have that option of notifications?
They seem to be of really nice quality but I bought a really large size and still no bueno.

评论概述: Horrible , these are guy jeans not for a women
评论详情: These aren’t for women , built for men

These cargo pants are very well-made and comfortable. There is no shortage of pockets and they are, actually, kinda flattering. Most cargo pants of thjis type (unisex-sizing, heavy on the pockets) tend to look overly mannish...these don't. I ordered the size 8/28 and though they are a bit tight (my mistake, not theirs), I'm keeping them for my skinny days (my weight fluctuates 10 pounds up and down throughout the seasons). I just ordered another pair in a size 10/30...they should fit my winter derriere just fine. (If they should go on sale again for $21.00, I'll be buying several more pairs!)

I got an 18, it was the largest size they had.  I was a little apprehensive at first but when I got them and tried them on I was quite pleased.  My hubs likes them a lot.  I'm on the curvy side and they fit nicely.  I haven't washed them yet, so hopefully there will be no unpleasant surprises.  Drawstring thing going on at the bottom of the pants leg, which I wasn't expecting, but they are cute nonetheless.  I recommend!

The material itself feels sturdy and durable. I love that there is a sinch at the bottom, that's especially helpful for tucking the pant leg into boots. However, the pants are much longer than I expected. The fit at the waist is accurate, but they are far too long for me at 5'4. They are even too long for my partner at 5'7. That is the main reason for 4 instead of 5 stars. They are only wearable for us if we are wearing shoes that the legs are able to tuck into. Other than that, they are great pants with a fantastic number of pockets. The black is also a nice, dark, deep color.
I got these pants to start my blue-collar job. They have plenty of pockets and are extremely comfortable and warm. Good quality fabric would highly recommend.
I like these cargo pants. The pants are high-quality, and the fabric is thick. They fit great and are the perfect length. Good value for the price.

Very nicely made cargo pants that can worn for casual wear or work.  They are thick and warm but very comfortable to wear.  I love the amount of pockets on these pants.  There is also a waist drawstring on these but I found the waist to be a bit small, I ordered by normal size and they just fit.  These can be machine washed but need to hang to dry.  I love the look and feel of these pants, so I’m very happy with these.

These pants are flattering and they fit perfectly. They are a thick material that doesn't tear easily. They do have a little bit of weight to them but have a drawstring inside the belt area and they don't slip down. There's eight usable pockets and they have buttons that push through. This is the only thing that I struggle with because I usually have my hands full when I am trying to put stuff in my pockets so snaps would be easier.

I think the quality of the material is really nice, however sizing is completely off. I would suggest going up a size or even 2. It was smaller than the size stated and therefore not usable for us. While they seem like good quality, I can’t give an overall positive review when the sizing is off by this much.

评论概述: Good high quality cargo pants. Waist is inflexible and tight on my thighs.
评论详情: BOTTOM LINE: 1. I recommend this pair of Raroauf cargo pants. 2. The current price of $40 is reasonable.  LIKES: - Good material. - Very nice color (Khaki-m). - Great pockets, even a pocket on the calf area. - Roomy in the lower leg area.  DISLIKES: - Waistband has zero give to it. - The thigh and butt area are a bit too tight for me.

When I received these, I found they were very small, and I ordered my usual size. They were also very long. They do have a tie at the bottom so you can tighten them at your ankle to keep them from drooping down and having you walk on them. However, there was much more material than expected. Also, the material is so thick. They are definitely durable and tactical in style, so that may be expected, I just thought the tightness, length, and thickness of the material made them seem confining and restrictive and  not comfortable at all.
They are comfortable. I use them for work. I work in construction. Many pockets, very convenient.
They fit good I got a size 8  , and I love the material . I order 2 more

评论概述: Great quality and true to size
评论详情: I listened to the overwhelming amount of reviews that said these run small and I am swimming in these pants. If I had ordered based on the size chart I would have been better off. Keeping these though because the baggy look would be perfect for a couple different Halloween costumes
They’re a little snug around the hips and butt, but they fit really well otherwise.

As a curvier woman, it’s hard to find pants that fit my shape while still making me feel comfortable and confident. Either it’s too big on the waist but great on the legs or vice versa. These have a nice slimming look to them and they’re such a cute style! I have these in 5 different colors I’m addicted lol
Yes I would buy again... I put 4 stars because it took about 3 weeks to get here
Muy grande realmente no se que talla soy
Love way fits. Pockets are great. Pocket holds iPhone. Going to order another if any other colors
Wish they were longer.

I like these pants, but they run really big. According to the size chart, a size 10 fits a 30 inch waist. My waist measurement is 33 inches, and it was MASSIVE around my waist. I ordered a size 8, and it still has some room. I could probably even size down another size but I don't want to have to return it again.
Love all the pockets and elastic in waist. I ordered black green but they just look black to me ? I ordered in army green this week.

Stitching is bad and all over the place. The fabric itself attracts little fibers like crazy, I used 6 sheets of lint roller on the first wear and I don't even have pets. Also leans on the smaller side, size 8 is usually a little loose on me and this is tight.

评论概述: BUY THESE! Perfect fit and very cute
评论详情: I’m 5ft 4in and about 125 lbs. - I got the size 28 and it’s just loose enough to skate with. Slightly stretchy but VERY nice thick material. Tons of pockets. I’m in love!
